section.name: DataNucleus Team
section.p: The management and direction of DataNucleus is provided by a small team of focussed individuals.

tr.td:
Andy Jefferson (United Kingdom)
Project Founder
Andy has over 20 years experience in the IT industry, working as a consultant for many companies in the banking, telecoms, and aerospace sectors as a C, C++ and Java consultant, including UBS, Nomura, Rolls-Royce, Lucent, and GPT Siemens. He has been contributing to Open Source for the last 8 years. db4o DVP 2008, 2009
Languages Spoken : English, Spanish

Erik Bengtson (Belgium)
Project Founder
Erik has worked for various large organisations as a Java consultant.
Languages Spoken : English, Portuguese, French

section.p: In addition to those above, other people have contributed to varying degrees in the development of this software.

DataNucleus tackles a wide range of problem areas - are you interested in contributing to the DataNucleus project and want to get involved? The best way is to become part of the DataNucleus community and start by contributing patches. From that, gain commit rights. From there you have demonstrated your abilities to us.
